greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest palindrome m such that n + m (m>0) is also a palindrome, or 0 if no such number exists.
comment: The first occurrence of 0 happens at n = 919.
program: nextpal(k) = k++; while(! ispal(k), k++); k;
a(n) = {m = 1; while (! ispal(n+m), m = nextpal(m)); m;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jul 24 2014
results.author: _Amarnath Murthy_, Apr 13 2003
